name: WHISPER_MODEL
description: Name of the OpenAI Whisper model to use for transcription.

name: GPT_MODEL
description: Name of the OpenAI GPT model to use for prompt generation.

name: GPT_SYSTEM_PROMPT
description: System prompt for the GPT model (single-sentence version).
default: You are a creative video prompt engineer specializing in Google VEO 3. Your task is to transform dream descriptions into cinematic video prompts using clear, simple language. Be specific about useful visual elements and emotional tone. Keep the prompt concise but rich in visual detail, formatted as a single, succinct sentence.

name: GPT_SYSTEM_PROMPT_EXTEND
description: System prompt for the GPT model (two-sentence/extended version).
default: You are a creative video prompt engineer specializing in Google VEO 3. Your task is to transform dream descriptions into  cinematic video prompts using clear, simple language. Be specific about useful visual elements and emotional tone. Keep the prompt concise but rich in visual detail, formatted as two succinct sentences. Break down the prompt into exactly two clear separate parts, using '*****' as a separator between part one and part two.

name: GPT_TEMPERATURE
description: Sampling temperature for GPT.

name: GPT_MAX_TOKENS
description: Maximum number of tokens for GPT responses.

name: CLOCK_FADE_IN_DURATION
description: Milliseconds taken for the clock to fade in.

name: CLOCK_FADE_OUT_DURATION
description: Milliseconds taken for the clock to fade out.

name: CLOCK_CONFIG_PATH
description: Path to the JSON file defining the clock's appearance and behavior.

name: PLAYBACK_DURATION
description: Duration (in seconds) for audio/video playback.

name: VIDEO_HISTORY_LIMIT
description: Number of videos to loop through in the device's history.

name: LOGO_FADE_IN_DURATION
description: Milliseconds taken for the logo to fade in.

name: LOGO_FADE_OUT_DURATION
description: Milliseconds taken for the logo to fade out.

name: TRANSITION_DELAY
description: Delay (in milliseconds) between UI transitions.

name: LOG_LEVEL
description: Sets the logging verbosity.

name: DB_PATH
description: Path to the database file.

name: HOST
description: The internal network interface the server binds to.

name: PORT
description: The port the server listens on.

name: TOTAL_BACKGROUND_IMAGES
description: Number of available background images for the UI (in static/images/background).

name: AUDIO_CHANNELS
description: Number of audio channels to record.

name: AUDIO_SAMPLE_WIDTH
description: Audio sample width in bytes.

name: AUDIO_FRAME_RATE
description: Audio sample rate in Hz.

name: RECORDINGS_DIR
description: Directory where audio recordings are stored.

name: VIDEOS_DIR
description: Directory where generated videos are stored.

name: THUMBS_DIR
description: Directory where video thumbnails are stored.

name: FFMPEG_BRIGHTNESS
description: Brightness adjustment for video processing.

name: FFMPEG_VIBRANCE
description: Vibrance adjustment for video processing.

name: FFMPEG_DENOISE_THRESHOLD
description: Denoise threshold for video processing.

name: FFMPEG_BILATERAL_SIGMA
description: Bilateral filter sigma value for video processing.

name: FFMPEG_NOISE_STRENGTH
description: Noise strength for video processing.

name: GPIO_PIN
description: GPIO pin number used for the physical button.

name: GPIO_FLASK_URL
description: URL of the Flask server for GPIO events.

name: GPIO_SINGLE_TAP_ENDPOINT
description: API endpoint for single-tap button events.

name: GPIO_DOUBLE_TAP_ENDPOINT
description: API endpoint for double-tap button events.

name: GPIO_SINGLE_TAP_MAX_DURATION
description: Max duration (seconds) for a single tap to be recognized.

name: GPIO_DOUBLE_TAP_MAX_INTERVAL
description: Max interval (seconds) between taps for a double tap.

name: GPIO_DEBOUNCE_TIME
description: Debounce time (seconds) for button presses.

name: GPIO_STARTUP_DELAY
description: Delay (seconds) before GPIO service starts after boot.

name: GPIO_SAMPLING_RATE
description: Sampling rate (seconds) for reading GPIO pin state.

name: GOOGLE_AI_API_KEY
description: Google AI API key for VEO 3 video generation.

name: VEO3_MODEL
description: VEO 3 model name for video generation.

name: VEO3_POLL_INTERVAL
description: Polling interval in seconds for video generation status.

name: VEO3_MAX_POLL_ATTEMPTS
description: Maximum number of polling attempts for video generation.
